overview:
Sebastian Rumberg ist the PR Manager for 6Wunderkinder. He makes sure that 6Wunderkinder, Wunderlist, Wunderkit and future products get press coverage in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. Aside from his PR work, Sebastian writes blog entries and dreams up new creative side projects for 6Wunderkinder.

Prior to working for 6Wunderkinder, Sebastian worked as a spokesman for a German marketing agency and freelance journalist. He graduated from the University of Leipzig with a BA in Communication and Media Science. He is the happiest with a blank sheet of paper, a pen and buzzing people around him.
